roleset.name: to make dim or indistinct, to conceal

example.name: all arguments
example.text: But the government now claims that [a group of company managers and lawyers]-1 engaged in an elaborate strategy [*ICH*-1] over five years [*]-1 to obscure from federal authorities the extent and details of `` widespread '' fraudulent billing practices .
example.arg: the extent and details of `` widespread '' fraudulent billing practices

example.name: transitive
example.text: The U.S. Coast Guard closed six miles of the Houston Ship Channel , where about 150 companies have operations [*T*-1] , because the thick , black smoke obscured the area .

predicate.note: Frames file for 'obscure' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.
